page.title: 06Area opinions,Bradford
page.content: We carried out a survey to discover people's{opinions}about this area.Overall people like this area very much.They especially{like}the friendly people,the convenience of shops,schools,libraries,churches and bus stops.The area is very residential and quiet and peaceful to live in.People particularly liked the view across the city and the old buildings in the area that still hold a lot of history.Too much traffic was one of the{dislikes}along with the growing number of roaming dogs.To{improve}the area people suggested that the following could be built-play areas with bike tracks and fields for children to play safely,swimming baths and a community centre would be a great asset that could be used by many.
